definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Such images have contributed to the taboo against marriage between first cousins.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的病態歸咎於對近親結婚禁忌的違背。

sentences.english: This practice would have reduced the likelihood of inbreeding, she added.
sentences.chinese: 她還補充說，這樣做可以降低近親繁殖機率。

sentences.english: Close relatives of the monarch of the United Kingdom are known by the appellation The Royal Family.
sentences.chinese: 近親國王聯合王國所知的稱謂王室。

sentences.english: Your level of familiarity should mimic the interviewer's demeanor.
sentences.chinese: 你的近親程度可能會模仿面試官的舉止行爲。

sentences.english: The police has informed the people who are near in blood kill in the accident.
sentences.chinese: 警察將在事故中被殺者的事通知其近親。

sentences.english: Inbreeding seen to bring down Spain's Habsburgs.
sentences.chinese: 近親結婚將將西班牙哈普斯堡皇室引向衰退。

sentences.english: The concern in setting a limit is the genetic risk of consanguinity.
sentences.chinese: 設定精子使用率上限是用來規避近親繁殖的風險的。

sentences.english: So she had blood-kin under her roof again and we sat back to watch developments.
sentences.chinese: 原來她家裏還有近親，於是我們坐待事態的發展。

sentences.english: Sure. If people are near in blood, they might pass on some genetic disease to the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 當然知道，近親結婚會給下一代帶來某些遺傳的疾病。

sentences.english: New cubs must be inbred further.
sentences.chinese: 新的幼崽必須進一步近親繁殖。

sentences.english: Related to delicacy, the cellar in the Otaru keeps its quiet popularity.
sentences.chinese: 作爲美食的近親，小樽的酒窖持續着安靜的人氣。

sentences.english: Bactrian camels have two humps rather than the single hump of their Arabian relatives.
sentences.chinese: 和近親阿拉伯單峯駝相比，它們有兩個駝峯。

sentences.english: As of now, neither swine flu nor its close relatives have been found anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，任何地方都沒有發現豬流感或其近親。

sentences.english: 'That lady must be our relation, 'she said.
sentences.chinese: “那個夫人肯定是我們的近親，”她說。

sentences.english: I live in North America, however, I have some close relatives in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我生活在北美，然而，我有一些近親在歐洲。

definition: to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
(of siblings) having the same father but different mothers/half (brother or sister)
